data.title: Newcastle Rugby League
data.meta_description: Newcastle Rugby League | 121 followers on LinkedIn. Newcastle Rugby League administers the premier rugby league competitions in the Hunter including the Denton Engineering Cup
data.text:
TRIPLE M AND NEWRL JOIN FORCES FOR FINAL SERIES ü§ù The Tooheys Newcastle Rugby League is excited to announce Newcastle radio powerhouse Triple M as the naming rights partner for the 2024 Newcastle Rugby League final series. The partnership brings together two brands that are embedded in the Hunter community. The Triple M Newcastle Rugby League commences on Saturday, 7th September and concludes with grand final day at McDonald Jones Stadium on Sunday, 29th September. Each Triple M Newcastle Rugby League final series matchday will include four matches ‚Äì two lower grades, a first-grade men‚Äôs and first-grade women‚Äôs match. They will start with a Sinalli under 19s match, followed by a Queen‚Äôs Wharf Hotel reserve grade match. The matchdays will then be headlined by a Denton Engineering Cup first grade men‚Äôs match and an Oporto Women‚Äôs premiership first grade women‚Äôs match. Each f the five clubs that participate in the Denton Engineering Cup will host a finals matchday The partnership highlights Triple M‚Äôs commitment to supporting local sports and engaging the Newcastle community with high-quality rugby league, which will be promoted across both the 102.9 Triple M and hit106.9 Newcastle stations. Newcastle Rugby League General Manager Adam Devcich said ‚Äòits extremely exciting to have Triple M as our finals naming rights partner. They are a brand that is such an integral part of the community and a great supporter of rugby league. They will be a great asset in promoting the final series‚Äô Southern Cross Austereo, Newcastle General Manager, Mike Crowhurst added ‚Äò‚ÄúThe Newcastle Rugby League final series if such a huge event on the local sporting calendar and Triple M is very proud to partner and further support and promote what will be a great series. We encourage everyone to get out there and support their team

WELCOME TO MAGIC WEEK! We are on the final countdown to the inaugural Brydens Lawyers Magic Round. Your map, schedule, brewers, foodies and some important notes ahead of THIS SATURDAY‚ÄôS Magic Round at No.2 Sportsground. Get your tickets and support come and support a local team! Enjoy 5 games of back to back @newcastlerugbyleague action, 15+ Brewers, Food Trucks, Live Wrestling between games and a whole lot more! Please note: Gates open 11:30am, this is also a cash-less event so make sure you bring your card for food & drink purchases. Tickets available at beerfootyfood.com or https://lnkd.in/gS-FVrrm and Oztix.

INTRODUCING A NEWRL. The time has come for Newcastle Rugby League to begin a new era. One that recognises our love, spirit & commitment to the game - a region big on footy. One that highlights the everyday individuals that make it possible - more than a footy comp, a true-blue community. Since 1910, Newcastle Rugby League has been the heart and soul of rugby league in the Hunter region and as the quality of our competition continues to grow, we‚Äôre excited to share our new brand to match this evolution.

TICKETS ON SALE NOW for our inaugural Brydens Lawyers MAGIC ROUND at No.2 Sportsground for Round 1 on April 13. For the first time, the festival is taking its winning formula on the road, bringing a raft of the state‚Äôs top brewers, local foodies, and old school footy vibes to the Rugby League heartland of Newcastle. Magic Round will be played at Newcastle‚Äôs Sportsground No.2 and host all five games of the first round of the Denton Engineering Cup. All games will be played at the same ground on the same day, a mouthwatering eight hours of Newcastle‚Äôs finest Rugby League all crammed into one day. An absolute ‚ÄòFootyathon‚Äô of epic proportions. Tix avaiable at https://shorturl.at/jkm38

Get ready for the ultimate day out at the footy when the Beer Footy and Food Festival partner with the Newcastle Rugby League to present their inaugural Brydens Lawyers Magic Round. The Beer Footy and Food Festival has become a much-loved annual event for footy fans yearning for a taste of nostalgia, packing out Sydney‚Äôs iconic Henson Park for the past 6 years. Now for the first time, the festival is taking its winning formula on the road, bringing a raft of the state‚Äôs top brewers, local foodies, and old school footy vibes to the Rugby League heartland of Newcastle. In the era of big stadia, the Beer Footy & Food Festival is a step back in time to when going to the footy was a weekly ritual to look forward to, a day out for family and friends to sit on the hill, to throw the footy around at half time and to watch a bit of footy every now and again. The Beer Footy and Food festival is about bringing together footy fans, beer enthusiasts and foodies for a shared experience. The event celebrates community, and nothing says community like local footy, and that‚Äôs why the team behind the festival are so excited to be partnering with the Newcastle Rugby League to present the Bryden‚Äôs Lawyers Magic Round. Magic Round will be played at Newcastle‚Äôs Sportsground No.2 and host all five games of the first round of the Denton Engineering Cup. All games will be played at the same ground on the same day, a mouthwatering eight hours of Newcastle‚Äôs finest Rugby League all crammed into one day. An absolute ‚ÄòFootyathon‚Äô of epic proportions. Participating club pre-sales now avaialble. Tix on sale to general public from 10am Tuesday, 27th February. All tix available via Oztix

TICKETS ON SALE NOW 2024 SEASON LAUNCH & DENTON CUP PLAYER AUCTION 2024 is set to be a cracker of a year, with multiple ex-NRL signings, quality players and extraordinary coaches. Nothing beats grassroots footy! Join us on Friday 22nd March 2024 to kick off our Tooheys Newcastle Rugby League Season Launch + Player Auction with guest speakers Billy Peden and Paul Harragon. Throughout the day you'll be treated with an included 3HR food and beverage package. You'll be entertained hearing from our first class Newcastle Rugby League coaches as well as interviews with some of our BIG player signings for 2024. Don't wait to buy as these tickets will sell fast! Tickets: https://lnkd.in/gJBgr6wJ Player Auction details: https://lnkd.in/gcVBkaRz #NewcastleRugbyLeague

üåüPARTNERSHIP ANNOUNCEMENTüåü It with great excitement we can announce that Brydens Lawyers are the naming rights partner for the inaugural Newcastle Rugby League Magic Round to be held at No 2 Sportsground on 13th April! Brydens Lawyers principal, Lee Hagipantelis says ‚ÄúIt is my great pleasure to announce Brydens Lawyers as the official sponsor for the Newcastle Rugby League Magic round. This is a wonderful initiative by Newcastle Rugby League that promotes not only the greatest game of all, but also its engagement with the local community by celebrating beer, footy and food. All of us at Brydens Lawyers are honoured to be a part of it. Congratulations to all involved and we wish you every success for what will no doubt be an amazing round of rugby league. @brydenslawyers
